definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: It says I'll have lots to eat and drink today.
sentences.chinese: 報上說今天我會有許多喫的喝的。

sentences.english: Why do they always attack me on the newspapers?
sentences.chinese: 他們爲什麼總是在報上攻擊我？

sentences.english: Why don''t you put an advertisement in the paper to sell that old car?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不在報上登廣告賣舊車呢？

sentences.english: The research was published in the Annals of Family Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究發表在家庭醫學年報上。

sentences.english: You think I give a crumpet what you write in your lousy paper?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得我會在乎你在你那張糟糕小報上寫了什麼嗎？

sentences.english: I printed them in the papers, and they gave great satisfaction to the publick.
sentences.chinese: 我把它們在報上發表了，讀者大爲滿意。

sentences.english: I learned about the present acute situation in Iraq in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 我從報上得知伊拉克目前的嚴重局勢。

sentences.english: We are close neighbours separated only by a strip of water.
sentences.chinese: 這件事在報上只是略談了一下。

sentences.english: Niether is suitable for a newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 每一個都不適合在報上登。

sentences.english: The ad was run in the paper for a week.
sentences.chinese: 這則廣告在報上連續刊登了一個星期。

sentences.english: The newspapers reported that the prices of radio-sets and TV-sets are going to be further reduced.
sentences.chinese: 報上報導說，收音機和電視機將進一步降價。

sentences.english: Has Shandong science department 478-tenths of can have reported the Shandong foreign trade occupation academy?
sentences.chinese: 山東理科478分能報上山東外貿職業學院麼？

sentences.english: I'm very glad when I read your advertisement in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興在報上看到貴處的廣告。

sentences.english: This Shanghai newspaper from 1912 is full of articles commemorating the first anniversary of the Republic.
sentences.chinese: 民國元年上海民立報上，有許多紀念國慶週年的文章。

sentences.english: Give in your name if you are willing to help.
sentences.chinese: 假如你願意幫忙，就報上你的姓名。

sentences.english: This famous politician often ripped into his opponents in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 這位有名的政治家常常在報上猛烈抨擊他的對手。
